title: Genesis Chapter 26 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 26 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What did the Lord do in Genesis 26:12?
questions.explanation: Genesis 26:12 states: "Then Isaac sowed in that land, and received in the same year an hundredfold : and the LORD blessed him."

questions.question: What did Isaac do in Genesis 26:31?
questions.explanation: Genesis 26:31 states: "And they rose up betimes in the morning, and sware one to another: and Isaac sent them away, and they departed from h..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 26:1, who went unto Abimelech king of the Philistines unto Gerar?
questions.explanation: Genesis 26:1 states: "And there was a famine in the land, beside the first famine that was in the days of Abraham. And Isaac went unto Abim..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 26:9, who said unto him?
questions.explanation: Genesis 26:9 states: "And Abimelech called Isaac, and said, Behold, of a surety she is thy wife: and how saidst thou, She is my sister? And..."

questions.question: Who said "Behold, of a surety she is thy wife: and how saidst thou, She is my sister? A..." in Genesis 26:9?
questions.explanation: Genesis 26:9 states: "And Abimelech called Isaac, and said, Behold, of a surety she is thy wife: and how saidst thou, She is my sister? And..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 26:17, who departed thence?
questions.explanation: Genesis 26:17 states: "And Isaac departed thence, and pitched his tent in the valley of Gerar, and dwelt there."

questions.question: According to Genesis 26:27, who said unto them?
questions.explanation: Genesis 26:27 states: "And Isaac said unto them, Wherefore come ye to me, seeing ye hate me, and have sent me away from you?"

questions.question: Who said "unto them, Wherefore come ye to me, seeing ye hate me, and have sent me away ..." in Genesis 26:27?
questions.explanation: Genesis 26:27 states: "And Isaac said unto them, Wherefore come ye to me, seeing ye hate me, and have sent me away from you?"

questions.question: Who said "unto him, We have found water" in Genesis 26:32?
questions.explanation: Genesis 26:32 states: "And it came to pass the same day, that Isaac's servants came, and told him concerning the well which they had digged,..."

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 26:2?
questions.explanation: Genesis 26:2 states: "And the LORD appeared unto him, and said, Go not down into Egypt; dwell in the land which I shall tell thee of:"

questions.question: Where did the events of Genesis 26:23 take place?
questions.explanation: Genesis 26:23 states: "And he went up from thence to Beersheba."

questions.question: In Genesis 26:18, Isaac called them.
questions.explanation: This is false. It was Abraham, not Isaac, who called them. Genesis 26:18 states: "And Isaac digged again the wells of water, which they had digged in the days of Abraham his fathe..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 26:3: "Sojourn in this land, and I will be with thee, and will bless thee; for unto thee, and unto thy seed, I will give all these countries, and I will p..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Sojourn in this land, and I will be with thee, and will bless thee; for unto thee, and unto thy seed, I will give all..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 26:4: "And I will ______ thy seed to multiply as the stars of heaven, and will give unto thy seed all these countries; and in thy seed shall all the natio..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And I will make thy seed to multiply as the stars of heaven, and will give unto thy seed all these countries; and in ..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 26:5: "Because that ______ obeyed my voice, and kept my charge, my commandments, my statutes, and my laws."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Because that Abraham obeyed my voice, and kept my charge, my commandments, my statutes, and my laws."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 26:7: "And the men of the place asked him of his wife; and he said, She is my sister: for he feared to say, She is my wife; lest, said he, the men of the ..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the men of the place asked him of his wife; and he said, She is my sister: for he feared to say, She is my wife; ..."
